dc_title_s: L'Amerique septentrionale : dressée sur les observations de mrs. de L'Academie royale des sciences & quelques autres & sur les memoires les plus recens. / par G. de L'Isle.; Title above margin: America Septentrionalis in suas praecipuas partes divisa, ad usum serenissimi Burgundiae ducis
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Includes decorative cartouche. Shows political boundaries. Shows routes of various explorers. "No. 98" in manuscript in upper right-hand corner. 1 map : hand col. ; 43 x 58 cm. on sheet 55 x 64 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
